import "../App.css" import React from "react"; import { NavLink , Link} from "react-router-dom"; import HomeImg from "./img1.png"; import { useVideo } from "../contexts/VideoContext"; import {allVideos} from "../Database/allVideos" import { displayVideos } from "../Database/displayVideos"; import searchIcon from "./search.svg"; const Home = () => { const { state: { historyVideos } } = useVideo(); console.log(historyVideos); const getFilteredVideos = (historyVideos) => { return historyVideos.filter((item) => item.existsInHistory); }; const filteredHistoryVideos = getFilteredVideos(historyVideos); const [isDesktop, setDesktop] = React.useState(window.innerWidth > 720); const updateMedia = () => { setDesktop(window.innerWidth > 620); }; React.useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("resize", updateMedia); return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", updateMedia); }); return (
